query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations) as total_conversations,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages) as total_messages,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages WHERE role = 'user') as user_messages;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4KLqRreKqAzJzdK.root --database c7L2WL7eHYzHLaQuuLSuK6 --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations) as total_conversations,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages) as total_messages,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages WHERE role = 'user') as user_messages;
